name: ScaleSqlAzureDatabase
friendlyName: Scale Sql Azure Database up or down on demand.
description: Azure DevOps Build/Release task for scaling an Azure Sql Database up or down on demand.
author: CodeStream

inputs.name: Sqlservername
inputs.label: Sql Server Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Azure SQL Server

inputs.name: Sqlserverusername
inputs.label: Sql Server Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure SQL Server username used to scale the server

inputs.name: Sqlserverpassword
inputs.label: Sql Server password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure SQL Server password for the user that will be used to scale the server

inputs.name: DatabaseName
inputs.label: Sql Server Database Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure SQL Server database to scale

inputs.name: PerfLevel
inputs.label: Sql Azure Performance Level
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure SQL Server password for the user that will be used to scale the server, valid values are 'B', 'S0', 'S1', 'S2', 'S3', 'P1', 'P2', 'P3'
